alert.note: Alert for Eddy; Nelson; Pembina; Western Walsh County (North Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks (Northeastern North Dakota and Northwestern Minnesota)
info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued October 25 at 6:47PM CDT until October 27 at 1:00PM CDT by NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 1 PM CDT FRIDAY... * WHAT...Heavy snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 6 to 9 inches. There is a 20 percent change for 12 inches or more total snow accumulation. Winds gusting as high as 40 mph. * WHERE...Pembina, Eddy, Nelson and Western Walsh Counties. * WHEN...From 7 PM this evening to 1 PM CDT Friday. * IMPACTS...Travel will be very difficult. Areas of blowing snow will significantly reduce visibility. The hazardous conditions will impact the morning and evening commutes.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. The latest road conditions for North Dakota can be found at travel.dot.nd.gov and for Minnesota at 511mn.org, or by calling 5 1 1 in either state.

area.areaDesc: Eddy; Nelson; Pembina; Western Walsh County
